name: June Allyson
description:
Get back...

You know, we shouldn't go there. We should discuss the life and career of June Allyson...

Get back into life...

June Allyson, a rather prominent actress who made her name in the 1940s. She was... well, in a bunch of movies you probably never heard of, and she is on our website because her heritage is not exactly clear. Born with the name Eleanor Geisman, she denied that those origins were Jewish...

Get back into life with Depend!

Alright, there we have it. Face it, it's quite unlikely we would have profiled June if, in the 1980s and 90s, she wasn't the face of Depend undergarments and, by extension, adult incontinence. To quote her, "enjoying your life is so much easier when you have full bladder control protection." We couldn't say it better ourselves!

Get...

Wait, how old are we again? Perhaps we shouldn't be joking about this after all...
